title: Pry adds three additional analysts to Virginia Tech Football staff - VT hokiesports.com
content: Pry adds three additional analysts to Virginia Tech Football staff  VT hokiesports.com
description: Virginia Tech Football head coach Brent Pry announced Thursday that he has added three additional analysts to his staff: Dyrell Roberts (offensive analyst), Jeff Carpenter (offensive analyst) and Kerry Webb (special teams analyst). That trio joins senior analyst Brian Crist and defensive analyst Xavier Adibi who were previously hired by Pry.
